trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> that may contain a collection of child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects.
A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup> can be a child of another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Объект <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup> может быть дочерним для другого <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class, with default properties.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" />.
The object to be added as the child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

If this object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> it will be added to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> collection; otherwise, an exception will be thrown.
Adds a child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
The parameter <paramref name="child" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
The text added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
Adds a text string as a child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.

A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an InvalididOperationException unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
trans-unit.target: Объект <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> не принимает текст в качестве дочернего объекта, поэтому этот метод вызывает InvalididOperationException, если производный класс переопределяет это поведение, что позволяет добавлять текст.

trans-unit.source: Creates a type-specific clock for this timeline.
A clock for this timeline.
If a derived class overrides this method, it should only create and return an object of a class inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.
trans-unit.target: Если этот метод переопределен в производном классе, он должен только создать и вернуть объект класс, наследующий от <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of direct child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
Child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
The default value is **null**.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children%2A> dependency property.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Этот метод используется для создания изменяемой копии замороженный <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> объектов (или любой <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> объекта).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Для удобства этот метод переопределяет наследуемую версию с помощью строго типизированной реализации.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Этот метод используется для создания изменяемой копии замороженный <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> объектов (или любой <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> объекта).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Для удобства этот метод переопределяет наследуемую версию с помощью строго типизированной реализации.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Instantiates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> object, using this instance.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> object.
The child object to add.
Adds a child object.
The text to add to the object.
Adds the text content of a node to the object.
